headline: Stocks Tumbled Over Fears of a U.S. Economic Slowdown
description: A wave of anxiety rippled through financial markets with the S&P 500 falling 3 percent due to signs of a slowing American economy, marking its worst day since September 2022.
newsletter_headline: Stocks Tumbled Over Fears of a U.S. Economic Slowdown
newsletter_sub_hed: Also, a judge ruled that Google violated antitrust laws and Bangladesh’s leader resigned

headline: Harris is expected to pick a running mate by tomorrow
description: Vice President Kamala Harris is expected to make her decision on her running mate by tomorrow morning, with a rally planned in Philadelphia later that day.

headline: A judge ruled that Google violated antitrust laws
description: A federal judge ruled that Google acted illegally to maintain a monopoly in online search, a landmark decision likely to influence other tech antitrust lawsuits.

headline: Flavor Flav’s water polo party
description: The rapper Flavor Flav has become a self-appointed hype man and benefactor to the U.S. women’s water polo team at the Paris Olympics, promoting the athletes’ accomplishments on social media and persuading celebrities to attend matches.
